data.value: CODE-000

data.name: MODULE_DEFAULT_TITLE
data.value: Module Title

data.name: SAVE_FILE_PATH
data.value: course-autosave.course

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_ASSESSMENT_INVALIDRESULT
data.value: The assessments result is invalid. It will be ignored in the calculation.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_ASSESSMENT_NOWEIGHT
data.value: The assessments weight is set to 0. It will be ignored in the calculation.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_COURSE_INSUFFDATA
data.value: The course has insufficient data to perform the calculation.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_COURSE_INTERPOLATED
data.value: The course has interpolated some values that were missing. The result is a very rough prediction.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_COURSE_REFFAIL
data.value: A module you have entered has a REF result. Current application settings recognize this as a degree failure condition.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_COURSE_RESULTNA
data.value: The final degree result could not be calculated.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_COURSE_RETAKEFAIL
data.value: A module you have entered has a FAIL result. Current application settings recognize this as a degree failure condition.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_COURSE_RETAKESIXFAIL
data.value: A level 6 module has a FAIL result. This is recognized as a degree failure condition.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_MODULE_INCONSASSESSMENTS
data.value: The assessments in this module have inconsistent total weight. The weights will be rescaled.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_MODULE_INVALIDCREDITS
data.value: The module has an invalid credit value. It will be ignored in the calculation.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_MODULE_INVALIDRESULT
data.value: The module has an invalid result. It will be ignored in the calculation.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_MODULE_NOASSESSMENTS
data.value: The module contains no usable assessments. It will be ignored in the calculation.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_MODULE_NOCREDITS
data.value: The module does not have a credit value. It will be ignored in the calculation.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_MODULE_NONSTANDCREDITS
data.value: The module has a non-standard credit value, this may or may not be an error.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_YEAR_INCONSCREDITS
data.value: The year has non-standard credit total. The modules will be rescaled to try and match standard values.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_YEAR_NOMODULES
data.value: The year contains no usable modules. It will be ignored in the calculation.

data.name: WARNING_MESSAGE_YEAR_NORESULT
data.value: The result for this year could not be calculated.

data.name: X_FAIL_ON_REF
data.value: false

data.name: X_FAIL_ON_RETAKE
data.value: false

data.name: X_STOP_ON_MISSING
data.value: false
